data.name: PostgresChannel_ConnectionEstablished
data.value: The postgres channel has established a connection and is listening to events

data.name: PostgresChannel_Disconnected
data.value: The postgres channel has disconnected and is no longer listening to events

data.name: ResilientConnection_FailedToConnect
data.value: The connection failed to connect. Retrying in {0}ms. Error Message: {1}

data.name: ResilientConnection_LostConnection
data.value: The connection to postgres was lost. Reconnecting...

data.name: ChannelWriter_ConnectionEstablished
data.value: The postgres writer has established a connection and is ready to send messages over the channel

data.name: ChannelWriter_Disconnected
data.value: The postgres writer is disconnected and is no longer sending messages over the channel

data.name: ChannelWriter_FailedToSend
data.value: The channel writer failed to send messages. Requeueing {0} messages. Error Message: {1}

data.name: PostgresMessageEnvelope_PayloadTooLarge
data.value: Payload is too long to we written to Postgres. Serialized message is {0} bytes but limit is {1} bytes

data.name: ChannelWriter_FailedToRequeueMessage
data.value: The postgres writer was unable to requeue messages. {0} messages have been lost
